General.Name: Jentayu Sustainables Bhd
General.Description: Jentayu Sustainables Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in trading and distribution of building materials and other products in Malaysia. The company operates through Trading, Renewable Energy, Property Development, Healthcare, and Others segments. The Trading segment distributes and supplies construction and finishing building materials, heavy steel products, architectural hardware, home improvement materials, cabinet systems, fuel, and lubricants for construction, infrastructural, and manufacturing sectors. The Renewable Energy segment provides sustainable energy solutions leveraging on renewables, clean and green technologies. The Property Development segment engages in the development of residential and commercial properties; and day-to-day repair and ongoing maintenance, security, and unkeep of properties. The Healthcare segment provides private healthcare facilities. In addition, the company provides roofing works, including metal roofing, prefabricated roof trusses, and ceiling works; and interior fit-out works and services. Further, it is involved in construction contracts; generation of energy by operating solar power plants; small hydro power plant turbines; and solar photovoltaic power facilities; and letting of properties. Additionally, the company trades, distributes, supplies, and installs kitchen cabinets, wardrobes, electrical appliances, sinks, and tap fittings; trades and distributes tiles, marbles, and sanitary ware products; trades in locksets and architectural hardware products; trades and distributes lubricants and fuel; and provides warehousing services. The company was formerly known as Ipmuda Berhad and changed its name to Jentayu Sustainables Berhad in January 2022. Jentayu Sustainables Berhad was incorporated in 1975 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
